item.title: Sadaf add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "Everyone’s worried about stopping terrorism. Well, there’s really an easy way: Stop participating in it." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Sadaf add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "The smart way to keep people passive and obedient is to strictly limit the spectrum of acceptable opinion, but allow very lively debate within that spectrum...." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Sadaf add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "I think it only makes sense to seek out and identify structures of authority, hierarchy, and domination in every aspect of life, and to challenge them; unless a justification for them can be given, they are illegitimate, and should be dismantled, to increase the scope of human freedom." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Sadaf add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "Either you repeat the same conventional doctrines everybody is saying, or else you say something true, and it will sound like it's from Neptune." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Sadaf add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "We shouldn't be looking for heroes, we should be looking for good ideas." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Sadaf add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "See, people with power understand exactly one thing: violence." -- Noam Chomsky

item.title: Sadaf add a quote by Noam Chomsky
item.description: "In this possibly terminal phase of human existence, democracy and freedom are more than just ideals to be valued - they may be essential to survival." -- Noam Chomsky
